actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the gross income exclusion with respect to personal injury liability assignments shall apply where the plaintiff becomes a secured creditor of the assignee.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any amount of assignments of personal injury liability payments whose recipient becomes a secured creditor of the assignee.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the gross income exclusion with respect to personal injury liability assignments shall apply where the plaintiff becomes a secured creditor of the assignee.
